exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) HP : forall n : nat, P n <-> (exists k : nat, n = f k) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y x, y : nat H : x < y Unable to unify "f ?M1408 <= f ?M1409" with "S (f x) <= f y".

In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) HP : forall n : nat, P n <-> (exists k : nat, n = f k) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y x, y : nat H : x < y Unable to unify "x < y" with "f x < f y".

original: simpl. intro H. apply f_mono. apply H.
